p: Cocoa powder is a by-product of cocoa ( Theobroma cacao). Cocoa is an important ingredient in the beverage industry and is known to contain polyphenols including flavonols, (âˆ’)-epicatechin, (+)-catechin, and quercetin, a type of flavonoid with antioxidant properties ( Sanbongi et al., 1997). Several studies have reported nutraceutical potential of cocoa powder extracts for modulating/controlling blood glucose levels and promoting antioxidant enzymes ( Amin et al., 2004; Tomaru et al., 2007; Jalil et al., 2008). Indeed, a recent study corroborated the veracity of cocoa powder in the management of DM ( Olasope et al., 2016).
